tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE city_population (
    city_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(255),
    population INT,
    median_age INT,
    average_income DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
    city_id INT,
    year INT,
    population INT,
    median_age INT,
    average_income DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city_population(city_id)
);

CREATE TABLE zoning_changes (
    change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_id INT,
    year INT,
    previous_zone_id INT,
    new_zone_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city_population(city_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (previous_zone_id) REFERENCES zoning_regulations(zone_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (new_zone_id) REFERENCES zoning_regulations(zone_id)
);
